title: Claude Opus 4 With Claude Code: A Developer Walkthrough
author: David Eastman
description: Our resident senior developer David Eastman takes Claude Opus 4 with Claude Code for a trial run — and is impressed with the results.
cntitle: Claude Opus 4 与 Claude Code：开发者演练
cndescription: 我们常驻的高级开发人员 David Eastman 使用 Claude Opus 4 和 Claude Code 进行了一次试用，并对结果印象深刻。
